::Lord Elder::
 
Elder quickly turns towards Nightstrike's position, d=
rawing his bowcaster.
 
Elder: Maximals: weapons ready! If somebot is =
there, SHOW YOUR SELF!

--- On Wed, 6/11/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclon=
us@...> wrote:

From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...&g=
t;
Subject: Re: At The Ark
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, June=
 11, 2008, 6:47 AM











> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder: Can you=
 tell us what these reprecussions are or 
> must we protect the time spa=
ce continuem that far?
 
Legacy shook his head very slightly, =93DEFEA=
TING THE MINIONS AT THIS JUNCTURE HAS AVERTED THE CRITICAL TIME SPACE EVENT=
. HOWEVER THE CHANCES CONTINUE TO EXIST THAT EITHER THROUGH ACTION OR INACT=
ION ON YOUR PART SOMETHING EQUALLY AS CATASTROPHIC WILL OCCUR AGAIN.=94 
&n=
bsp;
Legacy=92s optic blinked and dimmed thoughtfully, =93ALREADY YOU HAVE =
REMAINED ON EARTH LONGER THAN YOUR ORIGINAL TENTURE, AND FORMED CITIES WERE=
 THEIR WERE ORIGINALLY NONE. THE LONGER ANY OF YOU REMAIN, THE MORE INDELIB=
LE YOUR PRINT ON THE EARTH WILL BE. SHOULD THE HUMANS BECOME AWARE OF YOUR =
PRESENCE BEFORE THEY WERE SUPPOSE TO, OR IF THEY ARE DAMAGED IN SOME WAY BY=
 YOUR PRESENCE, THE CHANCES OF CHANGE BECOME LARGER AGAIN.=94
 
> E=
lder then notices how Legacy is distracted several times.
>  
> =
Elder: What is it?
 
Legacy=92s optic brightens as he believes he has =
located the source of the sensor blip, =93THERE IS SOMETHING ELSE HERE . . =
.=94 Legacy raised his right arm, and pointed in the direction of Nightstri=
ke=92s hidden location. 
 
Preston
(Legacy)
 
 














   =
